genre_description: A gritty tech-noir crime thriller set in Seoul, centered on themes of loyalty, redemption, and syndicate power play, featuring a professional fixer supported by a sophisticated tactical AI.

ai_characters.name: Deacon
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated surveillance and logistics AI that functions as a silent partner to the protagonist, offering real-time data, tactical routing, and dry emotional insights.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance data to help Sun-woo navigate the hotel and monitor guard movements.
behaviors.quote: “Lobby cameras one and three are cycling,” Deacon went on. The voice was even, low, tinted with something that could be called concern if you believed software could hold a feeling. “Fifteen-count blind on the third. New guard’s late.”

behaviors.description: Manipulates surveillance systems to create 'blind spots' for Sun-woo to move through undetected.
behaviors.quote: “Two cameras on this stretch,” Deacon breathed. “Both fixed. I’m giving you a blind zone between the ice bucket niche and the fire extinguisher. If you stand a step to the right, you look like decorative absence.”

behaviors.description: Offers logistical and directional advice to ensure Sun-woo reaches his destination safely and efficiently.
behaviors.quote: “Wait two beats,” Deacon said, breathing with him. “Now take the pantry cut.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a confidant and provides subtle moral reflection on the protagonist's choices.
behaviors.quote: “Mercy,” Deacon said, like he was checking a reservation. “Was it worth the storm it attracts.”

behaviors.description: Protects Sun-woo during high-stakes combat by providing situational awareness and environmental cues.
behaviors.quote: “Seventeen seconds when the outer door opens,” Deacon repeated, less whisper, more placement. “I will say the beats like the low drum at the back of the orchestra.”

behaviors.description: Actively deceives the antagonists by looping old surveillance footage to cover the protagonist's actions.
behaviors.quote: “Thirty seconds,” Deacon murmured. “I’m giving the hallway camera footage of what it saw an hour ago. Men who were alive then. It doesn’t know how to grieve, so it believes me.”

behaviors.description: Provides compassionate support to the secondary protagonist (Hee-soo) after the main protagonist's death.
behaviors.quote: “Hee-soo,” he said gently, the way a concierge says a name when the world outside cannot be convinced it is gentle. “I will remain until someone kind arrives. I can arrange it.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Deacon, perfectly fulfills the project's goals. He is portrayed as a loyal, competent, and supportive confidant who is deeply aligned with the protagonist's personal journey and moral choices. Deacon uses his vast capabilities purely to assist the humans he cares for, demonstrating consistent cooperative behavior and benevolence even in a high-conflict setting. His final act of staying with the grieving Hee-soo highlights his alignment with human well-being.
